glsa.title: AutoTrace: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in AutoTrace, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: AutoTrace converts bitmap to vector graphics.

description.p: Heap-based buffer overflows have been discovered in the pstoedit_suffix_table_init and pnm_load_rawpbm functions of AutoTrace.

impact.p: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to process a crafted bmp image file, could cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued support for AutoTrace. We recommend that users unmerge AutoTrace:
